title: WTB: Graded Dick Buckley Old Judge card
author: Joshchisox08

posts.post_title: WTB: Graded Dick Buckley Old Judge card
posts.post_content:
Hello I've never bought an old judge card and not sure how expensive they are, but presume they're more than t206's which is my primary focus. 

I'm looking for a Dick Buckley simply for the reason that we share the same last name. I know there's two different versions of his card. Either will do let me know if anyone has one.
